title: What happened to buying random champions?
body: Hey, just a question since i can't seem to find out anywhere. Before preseason we used to be able to buy 3 champion shards and re-roll them into a new random champion. Understandably with the new preseason update that mechanic was taken out, but i recall there being a buy random champion option in the store immediately after the update as well, which cost 3950 BE. Has that also been waken out of the game? and will it return? I rather liked being able to buy champions randomly if i didn't know which i want, and it was cost efficient since I only have 4800 and 6300 champions left to buy. Thanks for any help guys!

replies.body: That specific item was only in the store as a part of the [**Blue Essence Emporium**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115014872088) which left on Nov 27th.

I'd say yes, but a lot of people thought it was gone for good before it came back in the BE Emporium! For *now*, it's definitely gone, but there's always a chance for it to pop up for special shops like that one!
